Package ohos.data.distributed.common

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.distributed.common.Options

  • public class Options
extends Object
    Provides configuration options for creating a KvStore.

    You can determine whether to create another database if a KvStore database is missing, whether to encrypt the database, and the database type.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_DISTRIBUTEDDATAMGR

        public Options​()

    • Method Detail

      • isCreateIfMissing

        public boolean isCreateIfMissing​()
        Checks whether a KvStore database can be created if no KvStore database is available.
        Returns:
        Returns true if a KvStore database can be created if no KvStore database is available; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • setCreateIfMissing

        public Options setCreateIfMissing​(boolean isCreateIfMissing)
        Sets whether to create a KvStore database if no KvStore database is available.
        Parameters:
        isCreateIfMissing - Specifies whether to create a KvStore database if no KvStore database is available. The value true means to create a KvStore database if no KvStore database is available, and false means the opposite.
        Returns:
        Returns the Options object.
        Since:
        1

      • isEncrypt

        public boolean isEncrypt​()
        Checks whether the KvStore database is encrypted.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the database is encrypted; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • setEncrypt

        public Options setEncrypt​(boolean isEncrypt)
        Sets whether to encrypt the KvStore database.
        Parameters:
        isEncrypt - Specifies whether to encrypt the KvStore database. The value true means to encrypt the KvStore database, and false means not to encrypt the KvStore database.
        Returns:
        Returns the Options object.
        Since:
        1

      • isBackup

        public boolean isBackup​()
        Checks whether this KvStore can be backed up.
        Returns:
        Returns true if this KvStore can be backed up; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • setBackup

        public Options setBackup​(boolean isBackup)
        Sets whether to enable backup of this KvStore.
        Parameters:
        isBackup - Specifies whether to enable backup of this KvStore. The value true means to enable backup of this KvStore, and false means to disable backup of this KvStore.
        Returns:
        Returns the Options object.
        Since:
        1

      • isAutoSync

        public boolean isAutoSync​()
        Checks whether this KvStore is automatically synchronized with the KvStore of other devices.

        This method applies only to DeviceKvStore and SingleKvStore.

        Returns:
        Returns true if this KvStore is automatically synchronized with the KvStore of other devices; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • setAutoSync

        public Options setAutoSync​(boolean isAutoSync)
        Sets whether to automatically synchronize this KvStore with the KvStore of other devices.

        This method applies only to DeviceKvStore and SingleKvStore.

        Parameters:
        isAutoSync - Specifies whether to automatically synchronize this KvStore with the KvStore of other devices. The value true means to automatically synchronize this KvStore with the KvStore of other devices, and false means the opposite.
        Returns:
        Returns the Options object.
        Since:
        1

      • getKvStoreType

        public KvStoreType getKvStoreType​()
        Obtains the KvStore database type.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 for SingleKvStore, 1 for MultiKvStore, and 2 for DeviceKvStore, as enumerated in KvStoreType.
        Since:
        1

      • setKvStoreType

        public Options setKvStoreType​(KvStoreType kvStoreType)
        Sets the type of the KvStore database.
        Parameters:
        kvStoreType - Indicates the KvStore type, as enumerated in KvStoreType.
        Returns:
        Returns an Options object.
        Since:
        1

      • getSchema

        public Schema getSchema​()
        Obtains the Schema from this Options object.
        Returns:
        Returns the Schema.
        Since:
        3

      • setSchema

        public Options setSchema​(Schema schema)
        Sets the Schema for this Options object.

        After the Schema is set, the database will be created or opened as a schema database.

        Parameters:
        schema - Indicates the Schema to set.
        Returns:
        Returns this Options object with the Schema set.
        Since:
        3

      • getSecurityLevel

        public SecurityLevel getSecurityLevel​()
        Obtains the KvStore database security level.
        Returns:
        Returns the KvStore database security level. as enumerated in SecurityLevel.
        Since:
        5

      • setSecurityLevel

        public Options setSecurityLevel​(SecurityLevel securityLevel)
        Sets the type of the KvStore database.
        Parameters:
        securityLevel - Indicates the KvStore security level, as enumerated in SecurityLevel.
        Returns:
        Returns an Options object.
        Since:
        5
